name: Myrtle Arknights
description:
Arknights's Myrtle

use 0.9 ~ 1

You can try more flags.

.

Normal=

prompt : Myrtle,

Negative : hat,

.

Light Gold Celebration =

prompt : Myrtleuniform,

modelVersions.description: Improved the image quality of the learning image. Noise has been removed.
